name: Voice of the Abyss
description:
The plot of the game is about a man who has awakened in a strange place. Where all his deaths lead only to rebirth at the very beginning, forcing to overcome all the difficulties again. The ultimate goal of the player is to leave this insane place. 

The plot is not submitted directly, it needs to be thought out and collected on the fragments itself. Strange images and graffiti are also given fragments. 

A series of games is planned for this universe, on behalf of different characters, who will get into various troubles and overcome them. 

At the moment there are 2 endings, the number of endings and options for passing will be supplemented.

Inspired by the works of Howard Lovecraft 
12+.

Test Bild: https://drive.google.com/open?...
